headline: Why Apogee, A Rival To Regeneron And Sanofi, Rocketed 34% And Broke Out
summary: Shares of Apogee Therapeutics have gained 34% over the past two days as the small biotech looks to take on Regeneron and Sanofi.

headline: Regeneron Gets FDA Nod for Label Expansion of Oncology Drug Libtayo
summary: REGN secures FDA approval to expand Libtayo's label for high-risk skin cancer, boosting its oncology momentum amid Eylea sales pressure.

headline: Regeneron, needing a turnaround, gains new use for cancer drug
summary: Libtayo’s latest approval for a type of skin cancer should boost future sales, according to one analyst, but doesn’t have the “broad-reaching implications” for Regeneron's Eylea franchise investors had hoped.
